FileSystemDirectoryHandleEntries.summary:
The entries() method of the
interface returns an array of a given object's
own enumerable property [key, value] pairs, in the same order as that
provided by a for...in loop (the difference being that a for-in loop
enumerates properties in the prototype chain as well).

remarks.para:
-File System Access API
-The File System Access API: simplifying access to local files

FileSystemDirectoryHandleEntries.returns:
An array of the given FileSystemDirectoryHandle object's own enumerable
property [key, value] pairs.
